activities: Jazz Pharmaceuticals collects personal information of employees, customers, clinical trial participants, consumers, business partners and other in Switzerland in manual and electronic form.  This information may be transferred from Switzerland to the US in order to carry out a variety of business-related activities including but not limited to human resource administration and management, customer service, clinical research, patient support, medical information, product complaint and adverse event reporting and related activities
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President, Associate General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officer
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Associate General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officer
personaldata: Off-line, on-line and manually processed organization, current, prospective and former employees, client,customer, patient, health care professionals, vendor, clinical trial data, safety data
recoursemech: For disputes involving employee personal information received by Jazz Pharmaceuticals from Switzerland, procedures of the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland (FDPIC) to resolve disputes; and for all other disputes involving personal information transferred under the US-Swiss Safe Harbor principles, Jazz Pharmaceuticals has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints to an independent dispute resolution provider, TRUSTe who can be contacted at https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request
